mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(ID, USER_NAME, USER_KAKAO_EMAIL, USER_PROFILE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_USER.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{userKakaoEmail}, (SELECT ID FROM TBL_USER_PROFILE WHERE USER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL = #{userKakaoProfileUrl}))
mapper.select: SELECT U.ID, USER_NAME, USER_KAKAO_EMAIL, USER_APPROVAL, USER_DONG, USER_HO, USER_PROFILE_ID, APARTMENT_ID, USER_PROFILE_NAME, USER_PROFILE_PATH, USER_KAKAO_PROFILE_URL FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_USER_PROFILE UP ON U.USER_PROFILE_ID = UP.ID WHERE U.USER_KAKAO_EMAIL = #{userKakaoEmail}
